title.narrative: 002 ACCESS AND EQUITY

description.narrative: By 2015, regional capacity to provide equitable access to education to boys and girls at primary and lower secondary level strengthened in 11 regions, which contributes to Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Equitable enrolment and retention for boys and girls in 11 regions expanded and increased at pre-primary, primary and lower secondary levels of education by 2015

mailing-address.narrative: UNICEF House (Kazanchis - Opposite UNECA/German House) P.O. Box 1169 Addis Ababa

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2015, regional capacity to provide equitable access to education to boys and girls at primary and lower secondary levelstrengthened in 11 regions

description.narrative: Development and introduction of sector policy guidance and tools to address school related gender based violence is well underway, with considerable results achieved within the programme since late 2014. Foundational work on revising the national pastoralist education strategy has been critical as a first step in strengthening of regional responses. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:30/06/2016

title.narrative: Alternative education in place (e.g. evening school, weekend school, distance learning)

target.value: 2016:Innovative apprioaches such as mobile schools, ABECs, distance education, multi-grade teaching put in place and implemented in 6 regions

actual.value: 2016:0 as the MoE has preferred to review and finalise a national pastoralist education strategy prior to the introduction of innovative alternative education models within the regions.

title.narrative: of ABECs constructed and furnished for providing education opportunities for hard-to-reach out of school boys and girls
of media outlets that broadcast at least one PSA per year on the value of sending out of school girls and boys to school

target.value: 2016:11 (All regions including ETV and Radio Fana)

title.narrative: Specific policy measures in place to address gender-equity in schools (country to specify policy measures, e.g. sanitary pads, female teachers, toilets)

target.value: 2016:Packages of girls education support (tutorial, school uniforms, stationery materials, sanitary pads, scholarships) implemented in 11 targeted regions
